articles.title: No specific terrorist threat to Singapore despite Japanese advisory: ISD - The Straits Times
articles.description: Japan had recently issued an advisory to its citizens in South-east Asia, including Singapore, warning of a possible terror attack in crowded places.. Read more at straitstimes.com.
articles.content:
SINGAPORE - The Internal Security Department (ISD) said on Tuesday (Sept 14) it has seen no specific nor credible intelligence of imminent terrorist threat to Singapore.
